alert.note: Alert for Iberia; Lafayette; Lower St. Martin; St. Landry; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 8:16AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Iberia, Lafayette, northwestern St. Mary, northeastern Vermilion, south central Avoyelles, St. Martin and St. Landry Parishes through 900 AM CDT... At 816 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Palmetto to near Avery Island. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, New Iberia, Opelousas, Abbeville, Catahoula, Scott, Breaux Bridge, Franklin, Carencro, St. Martinville, Jeanerette, Krotz Springs, Leonville, Arnaudville, Melville, Palmetto, Belle River, Avery Island, Bayou Current and Morrow. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 96 and 128. Interstate 49 between mile markers 1 and 36. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Iberia; Lafayette; Lower St. Martin; St. Landry; St. Mary; Upper St. Martin; Vermilion
